onBoarding.body: An app that connects you to craftsmen in your area
onBoarding.choose: Choose the service you need and book easily.

login.subTxt: We will send you a verification code via SMS

otp.body: Enter the code sent to your phone number

userType.title: You entered the app as a ...
userType.body:
Choose whether you are a client searching for
services or a craftman offering services.
userType.subTxt: You can change your role later in settings.

clientHome.body: We are here to facilitate your services ...

contactScreen.title: Contact With Craftman
contactScreen.subText: You can contact the craftman via WhatsApp or copy the number to your clipboard. Please respect his working hours when reaching out.

cancelBtmSheet.title: Cancel Booking
cancelBtmSheet.subTitle: Are you sure you want to cancel the booking?

successCancel.title: Your booking is cancelled successful
successCancel.body: You have successfully cancelled the booking

rateScreen.title: Rate Service
rateScreen.subTitle: Your feedback will be published after review.

whoAreWe.title: Who Are We
whoAreWe.qualityTxt: We ensure high-quality services through skilled and certified craftsmen.
whoAreWe.reliabilityTxt: We build strong trust between craftsmen and customers through full transparency.
whoAreWe.completeSatisfactionTxt: We aim to achieve customer satisfaction through exceptional service and unique experience.
whoAreWe.rights: Â©2025 Final Project Code. All rights reserved.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.getInTouch: Get in touch with us through WhatsApp
contactUs.whatsCardBody: Click the button below to start a conversation with us on WhatsApp
contactUs.needHelpTxt: Feel free to ask us anything
contactUs.subTxt: For quick assistance, WhatsApp is the fastest way to reach us. We're happy to help with any questions or concerns you may have.

privacyAndPolicy.title: Privacy & Policies
privacyAndPolicy.acceptableBody: Users may use the Sanayai application only for personal and non-commercial purposes, with the aim of searching for craft and maintenance service providers or providing these services. Any illegal, fraudulent, or harmful use aimed at harassing service providers or users is strictly prohibited.
privacyAndPolicy.suspensionBody: If any violation of these terms is discovered, the application administration has the right to suspend or terminate the account without prior notice.
privacyAndPolicy.responsibilitiesBody: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account information and for all activities that occur under their account.
privacyAndPolicy.guidelinesBody: Users must not post content that is illegal, offensive, defamatory, infringing, or otherwise inappropriate. The administration reserves the right to remove any content that violates these guidelines.
privacyAndPolicy.protectionBody: We are committed to protecting your personal information. We collect only necessary data to provide and improve our services, and we do not share your information with third parties without your consent, except as required by law.
privacyAndPolicy.modificationsBody: We reserve the right to modify or discontinue any service or feature at any time without prior notice.
privacyAndPolicy.limitationBody: The application shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use the service.
privacyAndPolicy.agreePrivacyPolicy: By using our application, you agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy

logOut.title: LogOut
logOut.body: Are you sure you want to log out?

delete.title: Delete Account
delete.body: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
